hero.title: Cyber Police: Synthetic Rebellion
hero.subtitle: A social deduction game in a cyberpunk megacity

about.description1: Welcome to a world where androids have escaped the control of megacorporations. In Cyber Police: Synthetic Rebellion, you must identify replicants, investigate cybercrimes, and fight for survival on the neon streets of the metropolis.
about.description2: The game combines Mafia mechanics with a cyberpunk setting, where each role has unique abilities, and digital attacks can change the course of the game. Be careful: even after death, players can influence events using viruses and network hacks.

hiddenRoles.title: Hidden Roles and Sabotage
description: Inspired by classic 'Mafia' and 'Town of Salem'
Players don't know who is a Replicant and who is human

digitalAttacks.title: Digital Attacks
description: Intercept chats, falsify votes, post-mortem viruses

ghostInfluence.title: Influence After Death
description: Even the dead don't leave the game: Network Ghosts (humans) and viral programs (replicants)

multiplayer.title: Multiplayer and Voice Chat
description: Tactics, negotiations, and deception in real-time

slides.title: Day Phase: Discussion and Negotiation
slides.description: Players form theories, accuse each other, use private chats.

slides.title: Voting Phase: Who is Suspected?
slides.description: Hidden or open voting decides the fate of one of the suspects.

slides.title: Night Phase: Hidden Actions
slides.description: Replicants eliminate victims, and Cyber Police attempt scans and protection.

questions.question: How long does a game last?
questions.answer: About 20-30 minutes for an average group of 8-10 people.

questions.question: Will there be a mobile version?
questions.answer: Yes, a cross-platform implementation is planned.

questions.question: What are the system requirements?
questions.answer: Only a browser is needed (MVP version) or a lightweight client, details to follow.
